posts.content:
Hi all
Due to go France on the 21st through the tunnel has anybody had any experience's whilst all the caose is in place ,wanting to know how much time to allow to get through traffic and check ins ( live in N Kent normally takes about 45-50 mins ) and also any heads up on returning we are heading to Normandy area with camper & caravan.
Cheers Dave

Son went Saturday...Train time he had was delayed about 20 minutes...
Said all normal..
He allowed ages to get there roads fine straight in wait for his train plus 20..
He was happy..

I'm heading over on the ferry 16th. Hope it will be all sorted by then. Heading straight down the middle towards Toulouse.
Might see you on my travels Skipps!!

I went through about 10 days ago, got delayed by about an hour by operation stack ( having come via Dartford)and another 7 hours at the terminal!, hoping it will be okay when we return on Saturday. Website said delays of around 60 mins both ways earlier today.
